cgcloud__Contract__c.name: cgcloud__Contract__c
cgcloud__Contract__c.description: Stores the details of the customer contract object, which is used to track various types of customer agreements.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Accountable__c.description: User who's accountable for the customer contract.

cgcloud__Commit_Date__c.description: Date on which the contract was committed.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Initiation_Date__c.description: Date of the entry of the claim.

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: Describes the current phase of the customer contract process.

cgcloud__Responsible__c.description: User who's responsible for the customer contract.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the contract belongs.

cgcloud__Submitted_for_Approval__c.description: Describes whether the contract is submitted for approval. The mobility system (Sync. Purposes) uses this attribute.

cgcloud__Tactics_Date_From__c.description: This field is necessary to validate that the dates of tactics are in the correct range.

cgcloud__Tactics_Date_Thru__c.description: Calculates the max "Valid_Thru" date for all the contract tactics related to the contract.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: First date of validity period of the customer contract.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Last date of validity period of the customer contract.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Name of the workflow that's specified in the contract template.
